snippet: "Prototype: Opera/Theater/Now" is planned for next January, featuring the work of "serious young composers."
abstract: "Prototype: Opera/Theater/Now" is planned for next January, featuring the work of "serious young composers."
lead_paragraph: A music producer and a downtown theater said on Wednesday that they would establish a festival of new music-theater works next January called "Prototype: Opera/Theater/Now." The festival will last two weeks and take place at the Here Arts Center in the South Village, in collaboration with Beth Morrison Projects, which produces musical events.

headline.main: A New Music Festival Downtown to Offer Fresh Sounds and Words
